fields.headline: Corrections and clarifications
fields.bodyText: • A review of the TV series Collateral referred to Carey Mulligan as an Oscar-winner. The actor was nominated but did not win an Academy award for her performance in An Education (Carey Mulligan investigates the state of the nation, 17 February, page 60). • Near homophone corner: “After a bright opening Neymar ran again and again down blind allies” (Neymar wilts in Madrid as superclub collision descends into Disneyfied dystopia, 16 February, page 53).
